        Constructor.
        参数:
        key - the function key
        x1 - the x-coordinate of uppper left corner of image region
        y1 - the y-coordinate of uppper left corner of image region
        x1 - the x-coordinate of lower left corner of image region
        y1 - the y-coordinate of lower left corner of image region
